Flow.description: SFD 4213 - Flip Routing updates for new Sales Segmentation SFDC-3329- Updating Flip Owner Director 8_24_23v2 SFDC-3043 - remove SMS_Product and Email_Product screen components from Flip Screen and downstream SFDC 2670 - Update New Vertical Flip to Flip to Sales screen (DO NOT ACTIVATE UNTIL 7/1/23) + SFDC-2474 - Replacing the reference to the static CAMs and AEs Metadata table user values in the 'AE to be manually assigned" Node + "Manual Route" Assignment node + SFDC-192 - Added Sales Rep Role to the Flip Confirmation screen + remove ability to assign AE of Record
